subject: Customizing generated test scaffolding in Netbeans 6.9
msgSnippet: The first thing I do when I begin testing a class is use the tools/Create Junit tests function that netbeans provides to layout a scaffolding of the junit
messageBody: The first thing I do when I begin testing a class is use the tools/Create Junit tests function that netbeans provides to layout a scaffolding of the junit tests. I could save a lot of time in my testing if I knew of a way to customize the output of this function (beyond the given "customization" options). Does anyone know of a way that I can do this?
